name: Tanks A Lot! An Online 3D Android Game
name_original: Tanks A Lot! An Online 3D Android Game
description:
This    is an Online Tank Game where you fight enemies in an Android space instead of a PC Space. There is no Account Link because the Data is stored in the Phone Only. More Updates to be expected soon!

Tanks:

- Carro_Armato_M13_40, Chi-Ha, Cromwell IV, M4A3(75), Tiger, SOMUA S35, & the T-34-76

Youtube =  YouTube
